meanings.definition: A highly toxic protein derived from the castor bean plant.
meanings.sent1: Ricin can be very dangerous if ingested.
meanings.sent2: The police found a vial of ricin in the suspect's possession.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally added ricin instead of sugar to the cake batter!
meanings.sent4: The presence of ricin in the environment was like a silent threat lurking around.
meanings.sent5: The effects of ricin on the body are swift and severe.

meanings.sent1: She was aware of the lethal nature of ricin.
meanings.sent2: The assassin used ricin to carry out the sinister plot.
meanings.sent3: The villain's secret weapon was a vial of ricin hidden in his coat pocket.
meanings.sent4: The poison acted like ricin, slowly consuming everything in its path.
meanings.sent5: The mere mention of ricin sent shivers down her spine.
